Text.div:
The GAME_MASTER file was updated
First on 13 March 2018... Then again on 16 March 2018
It mostly affects the Move Sets pages.

div.b: Lugia came back as a Raid Boss to replace Rayquaza.
div.span: (With its move "Sky Attack" enhanced by the most recent GAME_MASTER.)

div.b: CP and HP Formulas have been added in the Technical Reference Section.

Text.div:
On Move Sets, Pokemon Chart, Raid Boss, etc.:
Mystical Pokemon now show the gold highlight.
Legendary are now highlighted with purple.

Article.Title: Enhanced Move Sets pages.
Article.Text:
The Move Sets pages have had significant enhancements:
Icons have been added to help you quickly see types and boosts.
The ability to apply filters to narrow down what you are interested in.
There is even an All Generations page. (If you don't mind the extra loading time.)
Take a look!

Article.Title: New Pokemon Chart (Beta) In The Charts Section!
Article.Text:
Interested in seeing what Pokemon there are? How about ones that aren't released in Pokemon GO yet?
Check this out!
